China's Dec factory activity likely contracted for third month - Reuters pollChina's manufacturing activity likely contracted for the third consecutive month, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday, weighed by soft demand for manufactured goods, a reading that would embolden calls for more policy support. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 05:15:47 GMT M5FHCCL4CRMCLN6HHQFVPC5CSM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-dec-factory-activity-likely-contracted-third-month-2023-12-28/Reuters世界中国
Vietnam's 'bamboo diplomacy' shifts into higher gearCommunist Party-ruled Vietnam has upgraded ties with the world's top powers, including former foes, China and the United States, as part of its "bamboo diplomacy", which it has pro-actively pursued since 2021 to navigate rising global tensions. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 04:08:36 GMT 7UH3Q3QFGBJ6NM73KICFA2DEQY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/vietnams-bamboo-diplomacy-shifts-into-higher-gear-2023-12-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
China pressures influential Taiwanese band ahead of elections - sourcesChina has pressured an influential Taiwanese rock band called Mayday to make pro-China comments ahead of Taiwan's key elections next month, according to sources with direct knowledge of the situation and a Taiwan security note reviewed by Reuters. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 04:04:21 GMT HXECAFVHZNK6ZF7NJXY7HWP25U https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-Pressures-influenceial-taiwanese-band-ahead-elections-sources-2023-12-28/Yimou Lee世界亚太地区
Klinsmann leans on Europe-based players to break South Korea's Asian Cup droughtSouth Korea coach Juergen Klinsmann will look to captain Son Heung-min and his squad's Europe-based players to steer the nation to their first Asian Cup title in 64 years when he leads his team into next month's continental championship in Qatar. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 03:51:15 GMT 4M6JNS3OEJJUTKSFZW3ESQ75NE https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/klinsmann-leans-europe-based-players-break-south-koreas-asian-cup-drought-2023-12-28/Michael Church运动的足球
China aims to expand domestic demand, ensure speedy recoveryChina will strive to expand domestic demand, ensure a speedy economic recovery and promote stable growth, according to an interim report on China's 14th five-year plan published by parliament on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 12:13:05 GMT CD2V3Y7YMJMQPC7OUMSWC2IJYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-aims-expand-domestic-demand-ensure-speedy-recovery-2023-12-27/Reuters市场宏观问题
BYD has obtained conditional testing license for level 3 autonomous driving on high-speed roadsChinese electric vehicle giant BYD , said on Wednesday it has obtained a conditional testing license for level 3 (L3) autonomous driving on high-speed roads. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 06:19:52 GMT FMO4Y6PS6VPWJFIJZHWIZAERPQ https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/byd-has-obtained-conditional-testing-license-level-3-autonomous-driven-high-2023-12-27/Reuters商业带电
